metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2295 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Versions of Puppet prior to 4.10.1 will deserialize data off the wire (from the agent to the server, in this case) with a attacker-specified format. This could be used to force YAML deserialization in an unsafe manner, which would lead to remote code execution. This change constrains the format of data on the wire to PSON or safely decoded YAML.

criterions.comment: puppet: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
